definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
Chung-hsing New Village, model town in Nantou County, west-central Taiwan, administrative seat of the Taiwan Provincial Government

sentences.english: National Chung-Hsing University. Department of Applied Mathematics. 100 …
sentences.chinese: 國立中興大學應用數學系。

sentences.english: ZTE, by contrast, keeps itself in the background.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中興公司始終使自己處在幕後的位置。

sentences.english: The largest vendors of the system are UTStarcom and ZTE.
sentences.chinese: 小靈通終端最大的提供商是UT斯達康和中興。

sentences.english: Tourist train was standing-by at Chung-Hsing Station, Hsin-Ying.
sentences.chinese: 新營糖廠中興車站待發中的營長牧場觀光列車。

sentences.english: Crosstown rival Huawei would be well advised to make similar moves.
sentences.chinese: 外界認爲，中興的直接競爭對手華爲也應該這麼做。

sentences.english: ZTE also has been eyeing U.S. markets.
sentences.chinese: 中興通訊也已經盯上了美國市場。

sentences.english: But ZET is unhappy to be regarded as "the second Huawei".
sentences.chinese: 但中興對於自己被視爲“第二個華爲”極爲不快。

sentences.english: Graduate Student, Department of Forestry, National Chung Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 國立中興大學森林學系研究生。

sentences.english: ZTE in 1990 thanks to the Lord Dachengquan Mr. Wang Xuanjie for the division.
sentences.chinese: 1990年拜大成拳中興之主王選傑先生爲師。

sentences.english: Emeritus Professor, National Chung Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 國立中興大學名譽教授。

sentences.english: But the firm's ambitious plans raise new challenges.
sentences.chinese: 但中興的宏偉藍圖帶來了新的挑戰。

sentences.english: Emperor Guangwu, whose reign was in the middle of the Han Dynasty, was an example of virtue and tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 漢朝中興之主光武帝，便是有德有量的君主。

sentences.english: Master, Department of Forestry, National Chung-Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 國立中興大學森林學系碩士。

sentences.english: Undergraduate Student, Dept. of Agricultural Machinery Engineering, National Chung- Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 國立中興大學農業機械工程學系大學部學生。

sentences.english: Analysis on Zhongxing Communication Company's financial report.
sentences.chinese: 分析中興通訊的財務報表。

feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
Zhengxing district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
